content.title: Maffucci Syndrome
content.description: Rare disorder characterized by enchondromas and venous malformations (spindle cell hemangiomas).

clinical_features.skeletal: Multiple enchondromas, primarily hands and feet

content.clinical_pearl: High malignancy risk requires surveillance; vascular lesions are secondary concern to skeletal tumors
